titles.title: Expressing support for designation of February 8, 2010, as "Boy Scouts of America Day" in celebration of the 100th anniversary.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 9/27/2008--Introduced. Expresses support for the designation of Boy Scouts of America Day in celebration of its 100th anniversary.
